metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5731 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in examples/openid.php inphpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.16, 4.4.x before 4.4.15.7, and 4.6.x before4.6.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viavectors involving an OpenID error message.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
